item.title: How to make my server with membership?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Ok I’ll give you a brief overview.

Create a membership boolean value.
Make it true if the char. is a member, false otherwise.
Save that variable when the player logs out, to store it and remember it.
Therefore you must write it to the character’s save files.
Now when the player logs in, use an if statement to check membership status.
If he’s a member, include all membership features.
If not, include all non-membership features and non-membership features only.

Read full topic
